headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  EINHORN, MARVIN D

lead_paragraph: EINHORN--Marvin D. August 30, 1920 to April 30, 2014. Actor, television director at NBC, husband, father, grandfather, great-grandfather. Much beloved by his family and his theater family. So sad to lose him, full of joy for having known him. Funeral on Friday, May 2nd at 1pm, Plaza Jewish Community Chapel, 91 St and Amsterdam Ave.
